title: Spider-Man: Far from Home
plot: Our friendly neighborhood Super Hero decides to join his best friends Ned, MJ, and the rest of the gang on a European vacation. However, Peter's plan to leave super heroics behind for a few weeks are quickly scrapped when he begrudgingly agrees to help Nick Fury uncover the mystery of several elemental creature attacks, creating havoc across the continent.
writers: Chris McKenna, Erik Sommers, Stan Lee, Steve Ditko
stars: Tom Holland, Samuel L. Jackson, Jake Gyllenhaal, Marisa Tomei
companies: Columbia Pictures, Pascal Pictures, Marvel Studios

trailer.title: Spider-Man: Far from Home
trailer.videoDescription: Peter Parker (aka Spider-Man) decides to join his best friends Ned, MJ, and the rest of the gang on a European vacation. However, Peter's plan to leave super heroics behind for a few weeks are quickly scrapped when he begrudgingly agrees to help Nick Fury uncover the mystery of several elemental creature attacks, creating havoc across the continent.

similars.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
similars.plot: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.
similars.stars: Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr.

similars.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
similars.plot: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.
similars.stars: Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Michael Peña

similars.title: Doctor Strange
similars.plot: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.
similars.stars: Benedict Cumberbatch, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Rachel McAdams

similars.title: Captain America: Civil War
similars.plot: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.
similars.stars: Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr., Scarlett Johansson

similars.title: Ant-Man
similars.plot: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.
similars.stars: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas, Corey Stoll

similars.title: Thor: Ragnarok
similars.plot: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.
similars.stars: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett

similars.title: Black Panther
similars.plot: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.
similars.stars: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o

similars.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
similars.plot: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.
similars.stars: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista

similars.title: The Avengers
similars.plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
similars.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson

similars.title: Iron Man 2
similars.plot: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.
similars.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Mickey Rourke, Gwyneth Paltrow

similars.title: Iron Man
similars.plot: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
similars.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard

similars.title: Captain Marvel
similars.plot: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.
similars.stars: Brie Larson, Samuel L. Jackson, Ben Mendelsohn
